description: Running into a few problems are you? That's to be expected. I can offer a few tips to assist you but I'm not sure I'll be able to hold your hand through it.

Either way, I'll give you a quick tip that might help you out. Everyone loves money, right? Well, you can earn it and it'll stay in your /b/purse/b/. You can /6/drop money upon death/6/, so don't do that. You can obtain coins from /6/loot chests/6/ as you explore the world, but also from /6/defeating bosses/6/. I'll give you a list of bosses that drop money below. Be careful though!
Promise me you wont become /4/selfish/4/ with your soon to be new found wealth!
